metadata.title: CVE-2016-3836 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The SurfaceFlinger service in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allows attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted application, related to lack of a defaultconstructor in include/ui/FrameStats.h, aka internal bug 28592402.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
